ComicInfo.Title: Strong Reasons Make Strong Actions
ComicInfo.Series: Kill Shakespeare: The Mask of Night
ComicInfo.Summary:
If you wrong us, shall we not seek revenge? Betrayed by the vicious cannibal Captain Lucius, Viola and Hamlet must undertake an odds-defying mission to punish a murder most foul.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Andy Belanger (a) & Shari Chankhamma (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | J. K. Woodward | 2 |

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andy Belanger, J. K. Woodward, Shari Chankhamma
ComicInfo.Characters: Hamlet, Juliet, Lucius, Titus Andronicus, Viola
